评论概述: Great quality sweater - I sized up and it was perfect
评论详情: Super cute fitted sweater. The color was true to the image and the fabric quality was great. I’m usually a medium in blouses, but I am tall (5’9”) and have an athletic build with long arms so I went up a size and bought a large to make sure the shoulders and arms were a good fit, and I’m happy I did because it ended up being a better fit for my chest as well (34C). The body is fitted enough that it still fit comfortably snug in the waist and accentuated all the right places without being bulky - in fact it actually fit me just like the model in the photos which was a pleasant surprise! I’ve worn it tucked into a black leather skirt and dress pants, and it looks great dressed up but would be cute with jeans too.
The color and style is nice and the material is soft as well as thick, which is perfect for cold days. Good price too.

评论概述: True to picture and flattering, but careful drying
评论详情: I bought this in the burnt orange color and it is a nice and unique color to and to my wardrobe. It fits nicely and definitely can enhance your cleavage if that’s what you’d like or I have paired it with a lace edge camisole to be a little more dressed up. My size recommended by Amazon fit well, I have a long torso but this thankfully is a good length. You may need to wear with high waisted pants/skirt if over 5’9 and not wanting to show midriff. I did, however make the mistake of popping this in the dryer on medium heat for a little too long (50 min). I did notice quite a bit of pilling in the fabric and wish I had stuck to a line dry only or very low heat /short time in the dryer to avoid this. I’ll see if I can make it nicer with an electric lint remover, but best just to be careful or look for a different fabric if you don’t want to take the time to dry.

I love this top. The material is so soft and I bought this during fall so It was perfect for that season. The fitting is absolutely amazing, I have got soo many compliments from family and friends. Would recommend purchase.

I was super skeptical on ordering a sweater from Amazon, but don't sleep on this sweater. The quality is phenomenal! The sweater is thick, soft, and has amazing stretch to it all while holding its shape. I have this in 4 colors, 3 I bought and 1 was a gift. I highly recommend this sweater!

This product is such amazing quality, it is thick and very stretchy and not itchy at all. The sleeves are the perfect length and the length of the shirt sits just right on the waist line. The details of the knot on the front and the knitted look really spice this top up. Super easy top to pair with any bottoms for a cute or a causal look. I'm 6'1 and 175lbs, bra size 34 C and I got a large and it fits perfect.

For reference, I’m 5’3” with a 36B bra size and am typically a size 6/8 in clothing. I’m always hesitant when it comes to ordering clothing online because it’s a gamble when it comes to the fit or item quality. Amazon recommended a large based on my size; however, I went with a medium instead after reading reviews on this brand’s typical sizing. First off, I 100% made the right call on the medium. As you can see, it’s more of a form-fitting sweater, but it’s so comfortable because the fabric has quite a bit of stretch to it. The fabric itself is thick and consists of a viscose/polyester blend, so it’s soft and isn’t itchy at all. In fact, it’s better quality than I expected it to be! The twisted knit front gives the sweater a really feminine look, so it makes it easy to take this sweater from day to night. In addition, the nutmeg color was accurate to how it was depicted online, and overall, it’s just a lovely color especially for the fall months. The only thing I can’t speak to is how this sweater will hold up after washing, particularly the twisted knot in front. Hopefully, it holds its shape well, so I’ll have to update my review if I notice anything wonky. Overall, I really like this sweater considering the price point, and I would happily buy from this brand again. I predict that I will get a lot of use of it out of it, and I look forward to wearing it more once the weather cools off a bit.
Great quality and top is soft with plenty of  stretch

I love the style of this fitted sweater. It has a really nice shape and fits true to size. The knit is thick and feels high-quality. The sweater is great value for money, and I would highly recommend.

This sweater is very soft, fairly thick, and is a stretchy fabric. The sleeves are on the longer side. The large fits a 5'3, 140lb, 38DD statue decently, could probably size down for a more fitted look, however, the 'breast pads' are shaped on the smaller side, making it look more awkward on a larger chest, especially when the shirt moves around throughout the day. Not sure I would recommend this to anyone who is more top heavy, but overall I like this shirt and have even gotten complimented every time I have worn it out so far. So far have not had any issues with this top going through the washer.
Really surprised by how thick and bouncy the material is. Very flattering and skimming. NOT cropped. Which is amazing. Would repurchase.

This is cute!  It's like a thin ribbed almost sweater material if that makes sense, it's not fuzzy like a sweater but is a bit thicker than a normal tshirt type fabric.  I think it'll be perfect for milder cool temperatures.  The fit is a bit awkward, like in the shoulders it bunches up a bit but it has lots of stretch so that helps.  The color is pretty and the twist detail on the front is the reason I got it.  I like the neckline a lot.  Overall pleased with this one!

I love this sweater!! Taking it out of the package, I could immediately feel how thick and soft the material of this sweater was. The color (I ordered Nutmeg) looks exactly how it does on the site, and I was excited because I don't run across this color very often. Stitching looks great overall, although I am not a huge fan of the seam that runs across the breast area.  I was a little worried at first because the sweater looked small and I wasn't sure it was going to fit, but it stretches out to fit your body. I think it manages to be fitted but still flattering, but if you want a looser fit, you should size up. If you are a little chestier, you may also want to size up if you don't like the super plunge look on a top.  Sleeve length is a little long, but I think that's intentional so you can cuff them. Just noting this for those who don't like that look, but I am a fan.  I really like this sweater, and I'll be asking for additional colors for my birthday!

This sweater is super cute and flattering on. The material is so soft and is stretchy too. I ordered a medium and probably could have gotten a small but will be keeping the medium. It is normal length and can be tucked into pants or to be a little more cropped.
I had the strapless one for summer & I love this one even more for fall!! Feels very high quality.

I love it. I am 5'5" 115lbs, 34C and wear a small. The small fit perfectly. There was no pulling at the bust for me and the knit gathers beautifully without bunching. It's very comfortable and the knit isn't scratchy at all. It has lots of stretch and ample length if you'd like to leave it out or tuck it in. I am wearing this with a nude bra and haven't tried it with anything darker. The material is pretty thick so I don't think it'll show. Black might be the exception. Nice top for the colder months.
True to size. Perfect for fall or winter outfits. Material is a little thicker but is very comfortable and soft.

This top is so trendy and versatile! I have a short sleeve that is very similar so I ordered this one with longsleeves for when the weather starts to get cold and it is perfect! The knit texture is so comfy and adds a relaxed touch. I wear this for both casual nights out or a stylish day look for work. I love it so much!

This is so flattering on my curvier size 10 body. I am a 34DDD and 5’4” and around a size 10, this is super flattering. It shows off all the stuff you want and none of what you don’t. It is quite warm and thick, which is perfect for me because I am always cold, but if you run warm you might get too hot in this. The fabric is very soft, it will be easily snagged because of how soft it is. Seriously love this sweater and want more colors, I highly recommend this!
This sweater is so cute! I love the twist detail in the front. It is different than the other sweaters in my closet. This would be a nice gift for someone, the $20 price point isn't bad!

There is so much to this sweater to like but there’s one manor issue that keeps me from loving it completely. The front puckers kinda funny and tends to hang odd. Maybe it’s just my girls that pull it oddly, I don’t know. But, other than that pucker it’s beautiful, soft, and sexy.

This is a lovely body contouring look without the discomfort of a bodysuit! I'm 5'6", 34D bust, 27" waist, long torso, and a typical size 4/6 (S) for reference.  I ordered the size S and it is true to size.  Fits absolutely well and looks amazing!  The fabric is a knit viscose/poly mix that feels soft and luxurious.  The style is a cropped rib-knit design with a criss-cross knit front and long sleeves.  If you're a long torso girl, like me, you will love this as it still give the cropped look without the super high mid-drift reveal!  You really can't beat the price point for a top that will take you from day to night and everything in between!

This top is super warm, thick, and flattering. The cut is a lot more modest on smaller chests. The material from this brand never fails to disappoint. The sleeves are a bit long but that is the only "downside" to this top. I personally am used to longer sleeves so it doesn't bother me. Overall, great winter top!
Surprisingly thick knit and very flattering fit. Full length to waist, not cropped. True to size and photo. Sleeves were a little long for me.

评论概述: It looks even better than on the photo!
评论详情: It's very soft and flattering! I wish it was a bodysuit but it is snug enough to where I could tuck it into my pants. I am usually a medium and I got a small and it fits perfectly, but I am also someone who likes tight clothing. I am 145 lbs and 5'10" for reference.
If you like being comfy and feeling pretty, this top is it for fall and winter. Great material (very stretchy and warm) and a really flattering cut.

It's a little longer and bigger than I expected, but I think it's probably true to size as I usually need things to be smaller than they come. Since it's long, it'll be good to tuck into pants or skirts. It feels soft and like it's good quality.
I'm so ready for the fall weather. The brown is perfect for when the season changes. This is a sexy yet simple top. Love it

This lovely sweater is made of very stretchy material, comfortable to wear, and the style is pretty with a unique neckline. It seems warm but not so heavy that it's only for very cold days. It would also be good for mildly chilly days. The color is rich, deep, and very appropriate for fall. I haven't yet washed it, but it does say to hand wash, so that's something to be aware of.  Also, to me it seems to run a bit small despite saying it is true to size. I ordered my usual size and find it a little tighter than I prefer, though it is still wearable. I think this style is meant to be more form-fitting. Still, if you like clothes to be more loose, go up a size.

This sweater is made of amazing material! It is thick and feels high quality. There is also stretch to the fabric, which makes it very comfortable. It is on the thicker side, so it will be perfect for the late fall/winter season. The cross detail in the front is very feminine and is flattering. The only thing that I noticed is that the sleeves were a bit long, but it is not a huge problem. It is not that difficult to fold up. I am between a size S and M, and ordered a medium. I feel that I could have gone with a small, but the medium was not too large either. It is just comfortable to not fit skin-tight.

This sweater is super comfortable and very cute. The color is so pretty, too. I would recommend if you want it to fit tight, size down. I got it in my usual size, medium, and it’s a little roomy, but I like it better like this. It is warmer than I was expecting, I could probably wear this into the colder months for sure. The knot and the neckline makes this sweater stand out against my other solid color sweaters.

评论概述: Soft and quality top - color not the same as pictured
评论详情: This top is SO soft and flattering. For fit reference, I’m 5’4, 34b, typically 110lbs. I absolutely love how this fits on me, although I prefer it tucked in as shown. I’ve included a photo of it untucked as well for reference. The sleeves are a bit long for me so I rolled mine but it still looks fine to me. The material is incredibly soft and feels high quality, this definitely feels more expensive than it is. I will note that I ordered this in the color caramel and it came significantly more rust red/orange than brown. It’s still a great top for me and I’ll still wear it, but that does limit me to wearing this more exclusively for fall than a neutral brown I could wear in more seasons. I’ve reduced a star for the color discrepancy. Besides that, it really is a great top and I’m likely to get it in more colors.

This long sleeve shirt it’s very flattering on. The material is a little thicker so I advised to wear it during the winter season is when it’s a little bit cooler. The Cut is really cute in a little bit sexy which is nice. This top can be worn both day and night. The color is very neutral. It’s like a dark beige. The shirt could be tucked in or out. Quality is really good I like that it’s thick and not cheap by any means. this top would look really cute with jeans or white pants. It runs true to size forget what you normally get.
Can’t wait to wear this in the fall/winter. Super soft and thick. Arms are a little long though

The fabric is very nice and the the material is not too tight! If anything, I wish I would have sized down, because the material would fit better in my opinion. My typical size of XL just seemed a bit big for me. Overall though, it’s made with quality so that’s a major plus
